<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 45PT;TEXT-INDENT: -45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 7:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 26.1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MANAGEMENT&#x2019;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 45PT;TEXT-INDENT: -45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SAFE HARBOR STATEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Certain statements in this report, including statements made in this Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations, may be &#x201C;forward-looking statements&#x201D; within the meaning of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, including our expectation as to our fiscal year 2017 and future results, cost savings from our financial improvement plan, operating data, new order bookings, revenue, expenses, net income and backlog levels, trends affecting our future revenue levels, the rate of new orders, the timing of revenue and net income increases from new products which we have recently released or have not yet released, the timing of the introduction of new products and our ability to fund our fiscal year 2017 and future cash flow requirements.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;We may also make forward-looking statements in our press releases or other public or shareholder communications.&nbsp;&nbsp;Whenever possible, we have identified these forward-looking statements by words such as &#x201C;target,&#x201D; &#x201C;will,&#x201D; &#x201C;should,&#x201D; &#x201C;believes,&#x201D; &#x201C;expects,&#x201D; &#x201C;anticipates,&#x201D; &#x201C;estimates,&#x201D; &#x201C;prospects,&#x201D; &#x201C;outlook&#x201D; or similar expressions.&nbsp;&nbsp;We claim the protection of the safe harbor for forward-looking statements contained in the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995 for all of our forward-looking statements.&nbsp;&nbsp;While we believe that our forward-looking statements are reasonable, you should not place undue reliance on any such forward-looking statements, which speak only as of the date made.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because these forward-looking statements are based on estimates and assumptions that are subject to significant business, economic and competitive uncertainties, many of which are beyond our control or are subject to change, actual results could be materially different.&nbsp;&nbsp;Factors that might cause such a difference include, without limitation, disruptions to our operations due to our financial improvement plan and related headcount reductions and position eliminations, risks associated with changes in our sales strategy and structure, including the impact of such changes on booking and revenue levels and customer purchase decisions, the risk that actual charges from the financial improvement plan differ from the assumptions used in estimating the charges and the risks and uncertainties discussed from time to time in our periodic reports filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, including those listed in &#x201C;Item 1A &#x2013; Risk Factors&#x201D; of this report.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as required by applicable law, we do not undertake, and expressly disclaim, any obligation to publicly update or alter our statements whether as a result of new information, events or circumstances occurring after the date of this report or otherwise.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Executive Summary
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Perceptron, Inc. (&#x201C;Perceptron&#x201D;, &#x201C;we&#x201D;, &#x201C;us&#x201D; or &#x201C;our&#x201D;) develops, produces and sells a comprehensive range of automated industrial metrology products and solutions to manufacturing organizations for dimensional gauging, dimensional inspection and 3D scanning.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our primary operations are in North America, Europe and Asia.&nbsp;&nbsp;We have one operating segment, because all of our products rely on our core laser technology.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, our products are divided into the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions - engineered metrology systems for industrial automated process control and assembly using fixed and robot mounted laser scanners.&nbsp;&nbsp;We also provide Value Added Services including training, field service, calibration, launch support services, consulting services, maintenance agreements and repairs related to our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	Off-Line Measurement Solutions - tailored metrology products for industrial gauging and dimensional inspection using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	standalone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	robot mounted laser scanners and Coordinate Measuring Machines (&#x201C;CMM&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;We also provide Value Added Services including training, calibration, maintenance agreements and repairs related to our Off-Line Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:27PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-SIZE:9PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	3D Scanning Solutions - laser scanner products that target the digitizing, reverse engineering, inspection and original
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	manufacturers wheel alignment markets.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	largest end-use market we serve is the automotive industry.&nbsp;&nbsp;New automotive tooling programs represent the most important selling opportunity for our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The number and timing of new vehicle tooling programs varies based on the plans of the individual automotive manufacturers.&nbsp;&nbsp;The existing installed base of In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions also provides a continuous revenue stream in the form of system additions, upgrades and modifications as well as Value Added Services such as customer training and support.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our Off-Line Measurement and 3D Scanning Solutions are used by and targeted to a wide variety of industrial customers, with the automotive industry representing the largest market for industrial metrology products.&nbsp;&nbsp;We have developed a number of new products in the past year for the 3D Scanning and Off-Line Measurement markets.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	In fiscal 2014, we developed a strategic plan designed to expand revenues and increase shareholder value over the longer term.&nbsp;&nbsp;In fiscal 2015, we made significant progress in implementing this strategic plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Specifically, we completed our first acquisitions in over 15 years, introduced numerous new products, launched a global Enterprise Resource Planning (&#x201C;ERP&#x201D;) system implementation and diversified our business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	In fiscal 2016, we implemented a broadly focused financial improvement plan that was designed to reduce fixed costs, improve our profitability and cash flow as well as improve our ability to capture the value of the business diversification strategy we started in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;We expect to realize annual pre-tax savings in the amount of $4.5 million due to our financial improvement plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fiscal Year Ended June 30, 2016, Compared to Fiscal Year Ended June 30, 2015
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Overview
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;We reported a net loss of $22.1 million, or $2.36 per diluted share, for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2016 compared with net loss of $0.5 million, or $0.05 per diluted share, for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Bookings represent new orders received from our customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;We expect the level of new orders to fluctuate from period to period and do not believe new order bookings during any particular period are indicative of our future operating performance.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	We achieved a record bookings level in fiscal 2016, despite unfavorable currency impact of $0.8 million, primarily due to including a full year of bookings from our CMM products related to our acquisition of the Coord3 brand in the third quarter of fiscal 2015, as well as an increase in Value Added Services.&nbsp;&nbsp;These increases were partially offset by declines in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions as well as 3D Scanning Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;On a geographic basis, bookings in Europe increased primarily due to a $7.9 million increase resulting from the inclusion of CMM bookings for the entire fiscal year compared to only four months in our fiscal year 2015, an increase in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions, partially offset by a decrease in our 3D Scanning Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in bookings for the Americas was primarily due to a decline in In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $6.6 million, partially offset by $2.3 million increase in CMM products.&nbsp;&nbsp;Bookings in Asia decreased primarily due to a decline in In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $6.7 million, an unfavorable currency impact and a decline in 3D Scanning Solutions, partially offset by a $1.3 million increase due to the inclusion of CMM bookings for the entire fiscal year and an increase in Value Added Services of $0.2 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Backlog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Backlog represents orders or bookings we have received but have not yet been filled.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	the level of backlog during any particular period is not necessarily indicative of our future operating performance.&nbsp;&nbsp;Although most of the backlog is subject to cancellation by our customers, we expect to fill substantially all of the orders in our backlog during the next twelve months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	The current year ending backlog increased by $1.7 million or 4.4% compared to the ending backlog at June 30, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in our backlog was primarily due to the increase in our CMM products of $1.1 million, an increase in our Value Added Services of $0.4 million and an increase in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $0.4 million, partially offset by a decrease in our 3D Scanning Solutions of $0.2 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;On a geographic basis, the increase in our Europe region&#x2019;s backlog is primarily as a result of timing of several large orders from our traditional automotive customers for our Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in our Americas region is primarily the result of receiving our first orders for our Measurement Solutions in new industries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	, specifically
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	white goods and aerospace.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in Asia&#x2019;s backlog was primarily due to orders being deferred due to the soft economic conditions, primarily in China.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Net sales of $69.1 million for fiscal 2016 decreased $5.3 million, or 7.1%, including an unfavorable currency impact of $2.5 million, compared to an extremely strong fiscal 2015 due to several non-recurring large projects that impact
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	ed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	fiscal year 2015 sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;CMM product sales increased $9.4 million due to the timing of the acquisition of Coord3 during the third quarter of our fiscal year 2015, while our traditional products decreased $14.7 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The $5.9 million decrease in the Americas was primarily due to decreases in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $8.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	a decrease in our 3D Scanning Solutions of $0.5 million and a decrease in our Value Added Services of $0.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	partially offset by an increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	in our CMM product sales of $2.9 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The $1.4 million increase in our Europe region sales was primarily related to an increase in our CMM products of $5.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	as well as an increase in our 3D Scanning Solutions of $0.3 million, partially offset by a decrease in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $4.6 million and a decrease in our Value Added Services of $0.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The $0.8 million decrease in our Asia region sales was primarily due to a decrease in our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions of $0.8 million, a decrease in our 3D Scanning Solutions of $0.5 million and a decrease in our Value Added Services of $0.3 million, partially offset by an increase in our CMM products of $0.8 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Gross Profit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Gross profit was $21.1 million, or 30.5% of sales, in the fiscal year ended June 30, 2016, as compared to $28.3 million, or 38.0% of sales, in the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in gross margin percentage was primarily due to the inclusion of the lower-margin CMM product line for a full year in fiscal 2016 as compared to four months in our fiscal year 2015, reduced sales from our higher-margin In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions, as well as the impact of fixed overhead costs on the lower sales levels, partially offset by $0.5 million gain from a settlement received in fiscal year 2016 from one of our service providers as well as $0.4 million in savings realized from our financial improvement plan announced in the third quarter of fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Selling, General and Administrative (SG&amp;A) Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; SG&amp;A expenses of $20.3 million in fiscal 2016, or 29.4% of total sales, were flat compared to SG&amp;A in fiscal 2015 but 27.4% as a percent of sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	was affected by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	sev
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	eral significant items.&nbsp;&nbsp;In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	fiscal year 2016, the full year inclusion of the CMM product line
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	four months in our fiscal year 2015 increased our SG&amp;A cos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	ts by $2.3 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	fiscal year 2016, we incurred $1.2 million in legal fees on pending legal cases compared to $0.6 million in fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;These items were partially offset by $0.7 million in savings realized from our financial improvement plan announced in th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	e third quarter of fiscal 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	as well as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	$0.2 million gain from a settlement received in fiscal year 2016 from one of our service providers.&nbsp;&nbsp;In our fiscal 2015, we incurred $1.6 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	in one-time costs related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	legal and consulting fees resulting from the acquisitions completed in that fiscal year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Finally, in our fiscal year 2015, we incurred $0.5 million related to the launch of our new ERP.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Engineering, Research and Development (R&amp;D) Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Engineering and R&amp;D expenses were $7.4 million in fiscal 2016, compared with $7.9 million in fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The $0.5 million decrease in fiscal 2016 primarily related
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	$0.4 million in savings from our financial improvement plan announced in the third quarter of fiscal 2016 as well as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	$0.3 million gain from a settlement received in fiscal year 2016
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	from one of our service providers, partially offset by an increase of $0.1 million related to product development efforts for our CMM products.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Severance, Impairment and Other Charges
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Severance, impairment and other charges for fiscal 2016 were approximately $2.8 million and relate to the financial improvement plan that we announced in the third quarter of fiscal 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;This amount primarily related to severance charges from our U.S., Germany and China locations as well as an impairment charge related to capitalized software and related inventory write-down in the combined amount of $0.9 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;We continue to estimate that the total expenses related to this financial improvement plan will be approximately $3.0 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Interest Income (Expense), net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Net interest expense was $0.1 million in fiscal 2016, compared with net interest income of $0.1 million in fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;This change was due to a decrease in interest income, because of lower invested cash balances in fiscal 2016 compared to fiscal 2015, as well as the addition of interest expense on liabilities acquired in the Coord3 acquisition and the borrowings required in the U.S. during the fourth quarter of fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Foreign Currency Gain (Loss)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Foreign currency gain (loss) was a net gain of $0.1 million in fiscal 2016 compared with a loss of $1.2 million in fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The loss in fiscal 2015 related primarily to the Japanese Yen, Brazilian Real and Euro.&nbsp;&nbsp;Foreign currency effects are primarily due to the difference in foreign exchange rates between the time our non-U.S. subsidiaries receive material or services denominated in U.S. dollars and when their local funds are converted to U.S. dollars to remit payment for the material or services received.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Income Tax Expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Our loss before income taxes was $9.2 million during the fiscal year ended June 30, 2016 compared to loss before income taxes of $0.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	during the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015.&nbsp; Our effective tax rate for fiscal year ended June 30, 2016 was (139.9)% on pre-tax loss of $9.2 million resulting in an income tax expense of $12.9 million. Our effective tax rate for fiscal year ended June 30, 2015 was 44.7% on pre-tax loss of $0.8 million resulting in an income tax benefit of $0.3 million. Our fiscal year 2016 effective tax rate is primarily driven by the establishment of a full valuation allowance against our U.S. federal net deferred tax assets in the current year of $14.3 million, and to a lesser extent, the establishment of valuation allowances in Germany and Brazil totaling $2.0 million.&nbsp; The need for these valuation allowances is described in Note 10 of the Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements, &#x201C;Income Taxes&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, included in Item 8 of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;BACKGROUND-COLOR:YELLOW;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fiscal Year Ended June 30, 2015, Compared to Fiscal Year Ended June 30, 2014
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Overview
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Fiscal 2015 was a transition year that included the acquisition of two companies during the third quarter of fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, our fiscal 2015 had expenditures for large, one-time acquisition-related costs and only a partial year of operations for the two acquired companies.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	We reported a net loss of $0.5 million, or $0.05 per diluted share, for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2015 compared with net income of $2.4 million, or $0.26 per diluted share, for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Bookings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Bookings represent new orders received from our customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;We expect the level of new orders to fluctuate from period to period and do not believe new order bookings during any particular period are indicative of our future operating performance.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Bookings by geographic location were:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">

	&#xFEFF;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	During fiscal 2015, we had a record setting level for bookings from our current operations, with bookings totaling $69.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;This compared with $68.5 million in fiscal 2014, which, at the time, had been the second highest year of bookings from current operations in our history.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	The record bookings level in fiscal 2015 was achieved despite a $3.5 million reduction in bookings as a result of re-valuing the European backlog to reflect the lower Euro exchange rate in fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;Bookings for fiscal 2015 included $4.6 million for CMM products related to our newly acquired Coord3 brand.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in bookings for the Americas and Asia represented higher orders for our Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Asia also had a second year in a row of record bookings.&nbsp;&nbsp;Bookings in Europe were severely impacted by the lower Euro exchange rate this year versus fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;Europe&#x2019;s $9.0 million decrease from the record level set in fiscal 2014 was primarily due to lower orders for our In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions, partially offset by $3.8 million in orders from our CMM product line.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Backlog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Backlog represents orders or bookings we have received but have not yet been filled.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	the level of backlog during any particular period is not necessarily indicative of our future operating performance.&nbsp;&nbsp;Although most of the backlog is subject to cancellation by our customers, we expect to fill substantially all of the orders in our backlog during the next twelve months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Backlog by geographic location were:

	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Our backlog was $38.9 million at June 30, 2015 and was our second highest fiscal year ending backlog.&nbsp;&nbsp;This compares with a backlog of $39.3 million at June 30, 2014, which was, at that time, a record fiscal year ending backlog for us.&nbsp;&nbsp;The June 30, 2015 ending backlog was down slightly from the June 30, 2014 ending backlog.&nbsp;&nbsp;The backlog of new CMM product orders was $3.8 million and offset a decrease in other Measurement Solutions of $3.7 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Lower Value Added Services and other 3D Scanning Solutions also contributed to the decrease.&nbsp;&nbsp;Asia&#x2019;s backlog increased as a result of higher orders for Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Europe&#x2019;s backlog decreased primarily as a result of the re-valuation effect of the lower Euro in fiscal 2015 versus fiscal 2014, which reduced orders in the European backlog by approximately $3.5 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Partially offsetting the decrease in Europe were the inclusion of orders for CMM products as a result of the acquisition of Coord3 in February 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:11.06%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:12.75PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
	(1.0%)
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Net sales of $74.4 million for fiscal 2015 increased $14.8 million, or 24.8%, compared with the same period in the prior year.&nbsp;&nbsp;New CMM product sales represented $5.8 million of the $14.8 million improvement over fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The balance of $9.0 million came from strong global growth in our traditional products.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sales in fiscal 2015 also increased in all geographic locations over fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The sales increase in the Americas and Asia was primarily from higher sales of In-Line and Near-Line Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;Partially offsetting increased sales for the new CMM products in Europe were lower sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	In-Line and Near-Line
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Measurement Solutions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The weaker Euro exchange rate in fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014 had the effect of decreasing European sales by approximately $3.4 million.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Gross Profit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; Gross profit was $28.3 million, or 38.0% of sales, in our fiscal year ended June 30, 2015, as compared to $24.8 million, or 41.6% of sales, in our fiscal year ended June 30, 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The lower gross margin percent in fiscal year 2015 versus fiscal year 2014 included the effect of the lower Euro exchange rate, which reduced gross profit approximately $1.7 million dollars.&nbsp;&nbsp;In fiscal 2015, we also had additional costs related to an accrual of $0.5 million relating to employment status and withholding in a foreign jurisdiction.&nbsp;&nbsp;Product mix also affected the comparison as the new CMM product sales in fiscal 2015 are at a lower gross margin percentage than our traditional products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Selling, General and Administrative (SG&amp;A) Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; SG&amp;A expenses of $20.4 million in fiscal 2015 were $5.2 million higher than SG&amp;A costs in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase represented one-time costs totaling $1.6 million for legal and consulting fees related to the acquisitions of Coord3 and NMS by the Company in the third quarter of fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also contributing to the increase was $1.4 million related to SG&amp;A activities of these two new businesses since they were acquired.&nbsp;&nbsp;Costs related to implementing our new ERP system in the U.S. were $0.5 million and will continue into fiscal 2016 as the new ERP system is rolled out globally.&nbsp;&nbsp;The balance of the cost increase related to higher professional services for legal and consulting and higher personnel related costs.&nbsp;&nbsp;The weaker Euro exchange rate in fiscal 2015 compared to fiscal 2014 decreased costs in fiscal 2015 by approximately $0.7 million.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Engineering, Research and Development (R&amp;D) Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Engineering and R&amp;D expenses were $7.9 million in fiscal 2015, compared with $6.7 million in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The $1.2 million increase in fiscal 2015 primarily related to a $0.5 million for higher engineering materials in support of product development efforts, $0.3 million related to activities of Coord3 and NMS and the balance of the increase related to higher salary, bonus and other personnel related costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -3.6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Interest Income, net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Net interest income was $0.1 million in fiscal 2015, compared with $0.2 million in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in interest income for fiscal year 2015 compared to fiscal 2014 was principally due to higher interest expense related to debt acquired as part of the acquisition of Coord3.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also contributing to the lower interest income was lower average invested cash balances in 2015 compared to fiscal 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Foreign Currency Gain (Loss)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; There was a net foreign currency loss of $1.2 million in fiscal 2015 compared with a loss of $0.1 million in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;The loss in fiscal 2015 primarily related to the Japanese Yen, Brazilian Real and the Euro.&nbsp;&nbsp;The loss in fiscal 2014 related primarily to the Yen and Euro.&nbsp;&nbsp;Foreign currency effects are primarily due to the difference in foreign exchange rates between the time our non-U.S. subsidiaries receive material or services denominated in U.S. dollars and when funds are converted to U.S. dollars to pay for the material or services received.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0.9PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Income Tax Expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#x2013; The effective income tax rate in fiscal 2015 was 44.7% compared to 19.2% in fiscal 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;Both fiscal 2015 and 2014 reflected the effect of the mix of pre-tax income and loss across our tax jurisdictions and their respective tax rates.&nbsp;&nbsp;Affecting the unusual effective tax rate in the fiscal 2014 year was the fact that the United States had a pre-tax loss at an effective tax rate of 40.8% that was partially offset by foreign pre-tax income at a lower effective tax rate of 28.1%.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note 10 of the Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements, &#x201C;Income Taxes&#x201D;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS>
<EFX_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL>
<A NAME="FIS_LIQUIDITY_CAPITAL"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Our primary liquidity needs are to fund capital expenditures and product development, support working capital requirements, and, when needed, fund operating losses.&nbsp;&nbsp;In general, our principal sources of liquidity are cash and cash equivalents on hand, cash flows from operating activities and borrowings under available credit facilities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Cash on Hand.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Our cash and cash equivalents were $6.8 million at June 30, 2016 compared to $11.5 million at June 30, 2015 and $23.1 million at June 30, 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Cash Flow.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	The $4.7 million decrease in cash from June 30, 2015 to June 30, 2016 was primarily related to $5.4 million of cash used for&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;operations and approximately $1.7 million used for capital spending and acquisitions of other long-term assets, partially offset by net sales of short-term investments of $2.4 million.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	The $11.6 million decrease in cash and cash equivalents from June 30, 2014 to June 30, 2015 was primarily due to the two acquisitions made in fiscal 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The cash outlay to acquire 100% of the share capital of both companies was $4.2 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Following the closing of the transactions, we paid off a short-term bank facility maintained by Coord3 for approximately $2.1 million and paid down certain acquired tax liabilities of Coord3 for $2.3 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additional uses of cash were $4.9 million used for operations, $1.8 million used for capital expenditures and $0.9 million used for other long-term asset purchases.&nbsp;&nbsp;Partially offsetting the use of cash was cash provided from net sales of short-term investments of $5.8 million and proceeds from stock plans of $0.9 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unfavorable foreign exchange rates decreased cash and cash equivalents by $2.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;We acquired bank debt of $2.1 million as part of the purchase of Coord3.&nbsp;&nbsp;We paid $1.7 million of this debt in March 2015 and the remaining balance was paid in June 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	During fiscal 2016, cash used from operations resulted from a net loss of $22.1 million, partially offset by non-cash items of $16.2 million, which was primarily due to a $12.5 million deferred tax valuation allowance recorded in our fiscal year 2016. Working capital changes reflected an unfavorable change in other current assets and liabilities of $5.7 million and a use of cash of $0.5 million for net purchases of inventories, partially offset by an increase in accounts payable of $1.2 million along with net collections of receivables in the amount of $5.5 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in payables represents fluctuations in the timing of payments as we monitor our working capital levels.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in receivables is primarily due to the collection of past-due receivables from our Asia region as well as the decline in sales in our fiscal fourth quarter of 2016, compared to our fiscal fourth quarter of 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;The change in other current assets and liabilities is primarily related to the timing of accrued expense payments and payroll-related items, partially offset by the restructuring reserve recorded for the reduction in force related to the financial improvement plan that was announced in the third quarter of our fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Financing activities during fiscal year 2016 was primarily due to $0.1 million of cash related to the payments on the note payable related to the manufacturing facility in Italy, offset by cash received under our stock plans of $0.1 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Working Capital Reserves.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	We provide a reserve for obsolescence to recognize inventory impairment for the effects of engineering change orders, age and use of inventory that affect the value of the inventory.&nbsp; The reserve for obsolescence creates a new cost basis for the impaired inventory.&nbsp; &nbsp;When inventory that has previously been impaired is sold or disposed of, the related obsolescence reserve is reduced resulting in the reduced cost basis being reflected in cost of goods sold.&nbsp; A detailed review of the inventory is performed annually with quarterly updates for known changes that have occurred since the annual review.&nbsp; During fiscal year 2016, we increased our reserve for inventory obsolescence by a net $0.2 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note 1, of the Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements, &#x201C;Summary of Significant Accounting Policies - Inventory&#x201D;, contained in Item 8 of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	We determine our allowance for doubtful accounts by considering a number of factors, including the length of time trade accounts receivable are past due, our previous loss history, our customer&#x2019;s current ability to pay their outstanding balance due to us, and the condition of the general economy and the industry as a whole.&nbsp;&nbsp;We write off accounts receivable when they become uncollectible, and payments subsequently received on such receivables are credited to the allowance for doubtful accounts.&nbsp;&nbsp;During fiscal year 2016, we increased our allowance for doubtful accounts reserve by a net $0.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note 1, of the Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements, &#x201C;Summary of Significant Accounting Policies &#x2013; Accounts Receivable and Concentration of Credit Risk&#x201D;, contained in Item 8 of this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
</P>
